description: [ZIPLINE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1114) can add itself to the exclusion list for the Ivanti Connect Secure Integrity Checker Tool if the `--exclude` parameter is passed by the `tar` process.(Citation: Mandiant Cutting Edge January 2024)

external_references.description: McLellan, T. et al. (2024, January 12). Cutting Edge: Suspected APT Targets Ivanti Connect Secure VPN in New Zero-Day Exploitation. Retrieved February 27, 2024.
